oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Recent chemistry of benzocyclobutenes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MEHTA, GOVERDHAN
KOTHA, SAMBASIVARAO
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: materials
thermosets
chemistry
polymers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This review will cover aspects related to the synthesis, reactions and applications of BCBs and provide an overview of the existing literature with appropriate emphasis on recent examples. Various synthetic targets such as steroids, alkaloids, anthracyclines, organic derivatives of C60 and cyclophanes using BCBs as intermediates will be discussed.
